data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of the cardinalfish genus Pseudamiops (Perciformes, Apogonidae) from the Red Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gon, Ofer, Bogorodsky, Sergey V., Mal, Ahmad O. (2013): Description of a new species of the cardinalfish genus Pseudamiops (Perciformes, Apogonidae) from the Red Sea. Zootaxa 3701 (1): 93-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3701.1.8
